entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Rondeau (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:14 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. High minus 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. High 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Low 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. High 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
